New Records: Anthony Edwards tied Anthony Davis for 15th all time for players 23 years old and below with 69th career 30-point game
Key Match Events: Timberwolves came back with a 45-24 fourth quarter to win 135-119
Anthony Edwards scored 13 of his 33 points in the fourth quarter
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Edwards expressed his drive to reach consistent postseason success
Rudy Gobert praised Anthony Edwards' major improvement
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Timberwolves traded Karl-Anthony Towns for complementary players in the offseason, signaling Anthony Edwards now holds the keys to the team
Others: The Timberwolves are one of the league's few title contenders with a 5-3 record
